title: New: MMEADOWS – Reflector
body:
I just love the unconventional pop edge to this debut original track from **MMEADOWS** (Kristin Slipp and Cole Kamen-Green).

The songwriting feels perfectly awkward at points – switching seamlessly from almost ballad-esque moments to more out-and-out electro-pop. Check out _Reflector_ below.

The songwriting feels perfectly awkward at points – switching seamlessly from almost ballad-esque moments to more out-and-out electro-pop. Check out Reflector below.
